Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Megan
Reviews.Content: Hi, I have had this television for almost  2 years now and haven't had a problem with it. For a 720p, I am suprised on how well the picture is. And for the  price, cannot beat it!

ProductInfo.Features:
Ultraslim design (3-9/10" deep) Ideal for wall mounting (with optional mounting kit, not included). 200mm x 200mm VESA compliant.
Two 8W speakers Deliver a lush soundscape. The sound leveler helps prevent volume fluctuations
5000:1 dynamic contrast ratio For an arresting viewing experience.
Inputs Include 1 composite (side), 1 component (side), 2 HDMI/DVI (side) and 1 RF.
720p resolution For stunning image clarity.
ProductInfo.Name: Dynex DX-37L200A - 37" Class - LCD - 720p - HDTV
